game.name: TheoTown
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Build and manage your dream city in this captivating simulation game. Create unique urban landscapes and enjoy compatibility with the mobile versions. Unleash your creativity and shape the metropolis of your dreams.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build and manage your dream city in this captivating simulation game. Create unique urban landscapes and enjoy compatibility with the mobile versions. Unleash your creativity and shape the metropolis of your dreams.
